data.name: How To Date A Magical Girl! Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC pack contains the original soundtrack for How To Date A Magical Girl!

With 34 amazing tracks, including the theme song, "A Ghost From Your Dream," this soundtrack is not to be missed!

All tracks are provided as .mp3 files.

TRACK LIST
A Ghost From Your Dream
Sunshine Through The Window
Little Hummingbird
Lazy School Day
Happy Days Ahead
Happy Days Ahead ~Rain~
Somber Nights
Somber Nights ~Rain~
Hello World
Starlight Date
Your Hand In Mine
The Yen To Spend
Hikari’s Theme
Yui’s Theme
Miyu’s Theme
Kaori’s Theme
Rei’s Theme
How Dare You
OMGWTF
Finding The Magic Within
Don't Give In
I've Got This
Fighting For The Truth
Darkness Creeping In
Goodbye (But Not) Forever
Lost In My Own Nightmare
Those Who Creep Slowly
Hikari’s Theme ~Black~
Yui’s Theme ~Black~
Miyu’s Theme ~Black~
Kaori’s Theme ~Black~
Rei’s Theme ~Black~
Moonless Dance
A Ghost From Your Dream ~Karaoke~


[LOCATING YOUR DLC ONCE PURCHASED & DOWNLOADED]

DLC files are downloaded to your game's Steam directory after purchase. The default location is:

\Program Files (x86)\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\How To Date A Magical Girl!\

If this is not valid on your computer, locate your game's install directory using these instructions:

- Open the Steam client and navigate to your game library
- Right-click the entry for How To Date A Magical Girl! and select Properties
- Click the Local Files tab
- Click Browse Local Files

This will open the game's directory, and once your DLC is installed, you'll be able to view the files.

fullgame.name: How To Date A Magical Girl!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 or higher display

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 or higher display
